quotes.quote: Celebrate summer sun-drenched days and starlit nights.
The summer night is like a perfection of thought.
If a June night could talk, it would probably boast it invented romance.
Holler if you're ready for some summer nights.
Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
Ain't nothin like them summer nights.
If a June night could talk, it would probably boast it invented romance.
The moon is swimming naked and the summer night is fragrant with a mighty expectation of relief.
Sound loves to revel in a summer night.
Summer night-- even the stars are whispering to each other.
It is as if everything else in the world stops as we lie here in the summer night.
The steady buzzzzzzz of the Katydid chorus, and the bass solo of the croaking Frog - a summer night's serenade.
The summer night was starless and stirless, with distant spasms of silent lightning.
The summer night was settling upon the neighborhood like a dark lace veil, casting dappled shadows on the roofs and sidewalks and lawns.
Celebrate summer--sun-drenched days and starlit nights.

On a summer night it can be lovely to sit around outside with friends after dinner and, yes, read poetry to each other. Keats and Yeats will never let you down, but it's differently exciting to read the work of poets who are still walking around out there.
